snippet: The International Tennis Federation said the American player Wayne Odesnik provided doping samples that tested positive for banned substances.
abstract: American tennis star Wayne Odesnik is barred 15 years from sport after urine samples test positive for multiple banned substances.
lead_paragraph: The International Tennis Federation said the American player Wayne Odesnik provided doping samples that tested positive for banned substances.

headline.main: Wayne Odesnik Barred From Tennis After Second Doping Violation
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; Wayne Odesnik Barred From Tennis After Second Doping Violation
